reviews.text: RUGBY TRAIN STATION 🚉 IS THE BEST IN THE WORLD  🌎           VIRGIN TRAINS          AND LONDON NORTH WESTERN RAILWAY        TRAINS  🚞    RUN ON TIME        STAFF ARE ALWAYS WELCOME 🙏   ARE NICE 👍           LOVE 💕           I LOVE RUGBY     TOWN     CENTRE

Stuart and Steven in particular at Rugby station helped me so much with an issue I was having. They were so friendly and you could tell they genuinely wanted to help. They turned a situation where I was really angry about into a happy one so thank you!!!

I rarely write any reviews but somehow this railway station  is blessed with the most friendly, fantastic staff I've ever seen. No matter how early or late it is, rainy or cold they were always greeting me with the smile. Buying a ticket, asking for help or just saying hello is an increadibly pleasant experience. Thank you good people - you make my daily commute so much more bearable. During difficult times it means a lot - more thank you probably think. Ah forgot to tell you - they wear elves costumes during the Christmas period and gave me chocolate for the Valetines Day
Staff are the best and work with you when you have a close by train. They make the journey a lot happier, staff... thank you for all your hard work ❤.
Good station with useful links around the country although a bit far from the main features of rugby. Friendly staff although rather pricey
